result.explanation: Invalid or missing ‘mdui:Description’ and/or ‘mdui:DisplayName’ under ‘md:SPSSODescriptor/md:Extensions/mdui:UIInfo’ in language with code ‘en’, or display name (= ‘DH course registry’) length (= 18) < 5 or > 33, or description (= ‘Registry of DH-related courses (study programs) across Europe jointly maintained by the research infrastructures CLARIN-ERIC and DARIAH-EU’) length (= 138) < 20 or > 100.
result.requirement: Partially a requirement for DFN-AAI registration. Partially a requirement for the GÉANT Data Protection Code of Conduct Entity Category. Completely a guideline for the CLARIN Service Provider Federation.
